resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81827</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81827</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4208</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Handwriting Remediation</string>
            <string language="es">Corrección de escritura a mano</string>
            <string language="ga">Feabhsúchán Peannaireachta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Handschrift Remediation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Remédiation D'Écriture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Remediação Do Handwriting</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Remediation Della Scrittura a mano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επανόρθωση γραφής</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These activities are aimed at children with special needs. It provides ideas which will help develop childrens' writing skills.</string>
            <string language="es">Estas actividades están dirigidas a niños con necesidades especiales. Ofrece ideas que ayudarán a desarrollar las habilidades de escritura de los niños.</string>
            <string language="ga">Tá na gníomhaíochtaí seo dírithe ar dhaltaí le riachtanais speisialta. Tugann sé smaointe a chabhróidh le peannaireacht na ndaltaí a fheabhsú.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="es">Inglés. Hoja de consejos</string>
            <string language="ga">Béarla</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Advice Sheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Chomhairle</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Aktivitäten sind angestrebte Kinder mit 
speziellen Notwendigkeiten. Er liefert Ideen, die helfen, 
Fähigkeiten Schreiben der childrens' zu entwickeln.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces activités sont les enfants visés avec les 
besoins spéciaux. Elle fournit les idées qui aideront à 
développer les qualifications de l'écriture des childrens.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estas atividades são crianças visadas com 
necessidades especiais. Fornece as idéias que ajudarão 
desenvolver habilidades da escrita dos childrens'.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Queste attività sono bambini puntati su con i 
bisogni speciali. Fornisce le idee che contribuiranno a 
sviluppare le abilità di scrittura dei childrens.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτές τις δραστηριότητες στοχεύουν στα παιδιά με 
ειδικές ανάγκες. Παρέχει τις ιδέες που θα βοηθήσουν να 
αναπτύξουν childrens' τις δεξιότητες σύνταξης εγγράφου.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rateblatt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Feuille de conseil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha Do Conselho</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio Di Consiglio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο συμβουλών</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>

          <description>
            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
